<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fiendish Word](/Feats.aspx?ID=1395) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 41 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can call forth a blasphemous word from the fiendish realms to punish your foes. Once per day, you can cast [_divine decree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=82) as a 7th-level divine innate spell. You must choose evil for the spell, and you can Cast the Spell regardless of whether you have a deity or what their alignment is.
name: Fiendish Word
